# 华夏智诚 PMP 考试辅导培训（陈刚）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/huaxia-zhicheng-pmp-kaoshi-fudao-peixun-chengang
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/huaxia-zhicheng-pmp-kaoshi-fudao-peixun-chengang
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install huaxia-zhicheng-pmp-kaoshi-fudao-peixun-chengang
huaxia-zhicheng-pmp-kaoshi-fudao-peixun-chengang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g huaxia-zhicheng-pmp-kaoshi-fudao-peixun-chengang
huaxia-zhicheng-pmp-kaoshi-fudao-peixun-chengang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
